data.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: If you don't read the newspaper, you're uniformed. If you read the newspaper, you're mis-informed
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Courage is resistance to fear, master of fear, not absence of fear
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Do the right thing. It will gratify some people and astonish the rest
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: A person who won't read has no advantage over one who can't read
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Wrinkles should merely indicate where smiles have been
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: When in doubt, tell the truth
data.author: Mark Twain
